timeline.bodyText: The cbCriteriaDao seemed unused, so I removed it here.
timeline.author: s-rubenstein

timeline.bodyText: Pls undo this change (& update IntelliJ settings to avoid star-imports... which reminds me, I'd still like to package a "AoU IntelliJ settings" file to make it easier for us to have a canonical set of configs we can all rely on)
timeline.author: gjuggler

timeline.bodyText: This feels like it could potentially be a breaking change, depending on which of the conflicting enums "won out" in our resulting Swagger-codegen world. What gives you confidence that this is the correct resolution, using the all-caps variant?
timeline.author: gjuggler
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3329,11 +3584,7 @@ definitions:
 
   PrePackagedConceptSetEnum:
     type: string
-    enum:
-      - None
-      - Demographics
-      - Survey
-      - Both
+    enum: &PrePackagedConceptSetEnum [NONE, DEMOGRAPHICS, SURVEY, BOTH]

replies.bodyText: Removing this one caused compiler failures, and removing the other one didn't. That suggests to me that maybe the caps one had been overriding the non-caps one. (hey look! One more reason to consolidate!)
replies.author: s-rubenstein
